abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #178                   INTRODUCED BY: ALDERMAN  TERRY KENNEDY An ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor and Comptroller of the City of St. Louis to execute, upon receipt of and in consideration of the sum of Three Hundred Dollars ($300.00) and other good and valuable consideration, a Quit Claim Deed to remise, release and forever quit-claim unto Cassandra Griffin certain City-owned property located in City Block 3709, which property is known by address of 1029 N. Spring.
